channel.title: RS Story
channel.description:
I started out runescape as a noob and was stuck on tutorial island for like a week. Then i finally found out how to turn on the "Run" button, yeah it may seem funny but that was the beginning of this epic failed time i had in runescape.
When i finished the tutorial i started out woodcutting for cash, since then it has been my favourite skill. I had woodcutted around 1hour a day and trained combat and other skills. I used to dream about runescape at school, never studied and still got Good grades.
When i got my PC i was told by my parents that if i had a drop in Grades my PC will dissapear. So i had to concentrate to the Max at School, Whilst at home playing runescape for 6hrs a day and then sleeping, waking up at 6am and playing for 2hrs before going school.
My Timetable:- 6:00: Wake up 6:00-6:05: Brush teeth & get ready for the day 6:05-8:00: Nerd RuneScape. 8:00-15:30: Do school whilst thinking of woodcutting. 15:30-24:00: Nerd RuneScape followed by 6hours of sleeping.
After a while i soon found a way to get Members although my parents didnt let me :(. I would wake up at 6am and buy members via Phone and put the cash it costed in my Mum's Wallet. Lol?
Anyways, after i had become a member i had like a quite high woodcutting level and like a combat of 70. I made 8m in my first week, but then got scammed since i had no idea what these phising sites were. I felt really upset... All that hard woodcutting went to waste.
Then, i found out my neighbour plays runescape to so he and me started playing together. I was always 1 step ahead of him and still am. (Me = 111cb 2 99s, He = 105cb no 99s) We always told each other the secrets of this game. I and he learnt alot during this peroid.
Soon, I had made another 8m and finally wanted to grab a skillcape, I was depressed because people lower Combat levels had trimmed skillcapes. Within 4months i started and got 99 in the Skill Cooking. I was happy and had a fail of a party. But i was happy since everyone who played with me alot was there.
After this i started doing some quests with my neighbour whilst woodcutting 1hr a day. I had also been scammed of 11m during this period, and helped countless people, [Also saved like 20+ from getting scammed]. I and my neighbour also promised to each other we wont quit till were maxed out.
Soon, I did Desert Treasure and did abit of magic. I used to Teleport to "Camelot" with Autoclicking... Lol? Yeah its a retarded idea. I got like 10 levels from it [63-73] and stopped after reliasing i lost over 4m from doing it... At that time i started playing private servers on "Silab"s client, like 1hr a day when i got fustrated from RuneScape.
After a while my close friend (not neighbour) got Moderator Status. I was not happy for him though because he did the following during the same time which i played:- Botted, Use of Glitches, Scammed over 300m+ from people, Advertised websites & many more I cant remember of. I thought to my self "This Game is F**KING B***S****" i was so fustrated after all my work i wasnt even recognised.
Very soon i got a Mod friend, Which was going for 99wcing at the time, After she achieved it i started playing runescape for 10hrs a day and even bunking off school and shortly i achieved it. Very soon after I reliased i had lost over 30m since i started this game and now had 8m.
I always wanted a GodSword and always will... This game has taught me to deal with life and how to treat others. I during this period got muted for talking to people at "Varrock" in f2p helping them gain levels, obtaining more items and teaching them some tips on how to improve.
I had now reliased i had wasted over £30 on membership status and reliased i'd call it quits. So i started playing RuneScape Private Servers. Soon i reliased if i was to achieve my goal, I would set back to RuneScape asap. I would not like to F**K over a Promise for a R*****DED game. When i came back i found out that i could lend peoples items and also shortly went to soulwars. I used to camp like a B***H in corners whilst putting a Beer Glass on my Camera Movement Keys.
This way i gotten my mage from 80-85. Soon i would high alch and lose another 4m from doing this. Then i started merching, failed over 3m and quit merching. I reobtained my 8m by my hard work and am currently f2p looking for a good method to make cash to come back.
-- Former RS Addict a.k.a Me. lol?
If you've been like this once post a reply :D

item.title: RS Story
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

In 2008 on christmas when we weren’t on school i used to play all day, either train str on runescape or just look at moparscape or r00n-serba tuts from morning 8:00 till like 23-24:00. xD
Realised it was a waste of my life so i’m trying to get away from the computer.

Read full topic

item.title: RS Story
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:42, topic:333282”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=429691.msg3155564#msg3155564 date=1269014334]

Newty anyone who plays rs or rsps obviously has a very awsome life!

My life consists of a alot more then runescape and moparscape… This is just a small portion of what I do every day.

now adays i go on this forums for 1hr. go to mw2 for 1hr. then do something else 1hr. do sports 1hr. eat 1hr. [get the pattern? :D]
[/quote]What a waste of time.
Should be more like: 12 hours Mopar, 6 hours RSPS and 6 hours Runescape.[/quote]
You’d be dead in a few days.

Read full topic
